title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide
code: compare_slide(   slide_file,   verbose = TRUE,   create_comparison_pdf = FALSE,   thresh_psnr = 20,   dpi_check = 50,   eps_signif = 0.5,   dpi_out = 100,   pixel_tol = 50,   view = FALSE,   overwrite = FALSE )

title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide
text: slide_file [character(1)] Name (single) slide, without .tex extension. See examples find_slide_tex(). verbose [TRUE]: Print additional output console. create_comparison_pdf [FALSE]: Use diff-pdf create comparison PDF ./comparison/<slide-name>.pdf. PDF contains slide pages detected differences, highlighted red/blue. thresh_psnr [20]: PSNR threshold difference detection diff-pdf-visually. Higher sensitive. dpi_check [50] Resolution rasterised files used diff-pdf-visually. Lower coarse. eps_signif [0.5] Significance threshold difference detection diff-pdf-visually force fewer false-positives. dpi_out [100] Resolution output PDF produced diff-pdf. Lower values lead pixelated diff PDFs. pixel_tol [50] Per-page pixel tolerance comparison used diff-pdf. view [FALSE] interactive use: Opens window showing comparison diff. overwrite [FALSE] Re-creates output diff PDF even already exists appears date.

title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide
text: Invisibly: list results: passed: TRUE indicates successful comparison, FALSE failure. reason: Shorthand reason failing comparison. pages: Vector pages differences. output: Full output produced diff-pdf-visually. Also prints summary, e.g.: "! slides-cart-computationalaspects: Changes detected pages: 11 12 (signif.: 0 0)"

title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide
text: First uses diff-pdf-visually check slides differences based PSNR rasterised versions slides (adjustable thresh_psnr), uses diff-pdf create PDF highlighting differences create_comparison_pdf TRUE. re-runs diff-pdf create comparison PDF file output file ./comparison/<slide-name>.pdf recent input PDF files. way can safely re-run function repeatedly without worrying computational overhead.

title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide
text: Uses diff-pdf-visually diff-pdf hood, may need adjust $PATH.

title: Compare slide PDF against reference PDF — compare_slide

title: lese 0.3.9000 (In development)
text: Add experimental latexmk_docker() run latexmk wrapped docker image fixed TeXLive version compile_slide() gains method argument, defaulting "system" use local ltexmk. Can "docker" use new latexmk_docker() instead. Remove compile_slide_tinytex() convert somewhat simpler latexmk_tinytex() use compile_slide() clean_slide() gains keep_pdf option, defaulting FALSE previous behavior. clean_slide() gens check_status option, analogous compile_slide(). argument compile_slide() passed clean_slide(). compare_slide() gains additional option eps_signif ([0.5]) manually filter output diff-pdf-visually decrease number false-positives.

title: lese 0.3.9000 (In development)
text: vbframe environment considered deprecated replace “regular” beamer frames. Removed framenumber continuation counter lmu-lecture.sty simplification Related: vframe environment (rarely used) now removed. Add cheatsheet preamble content I2ML. Might need refactor adaptation lectures also use . Breaking changes recently introduced macros (see wiki): splitV now maps splitVCC, splitVTT itemizefill renamed itemizeF New macros (see wiki usage instructions) Built upon modular kitemize environment. Added framei environment automatically wraps content flexible itemize environments font size spacing controls. Added frame2, like frame also font size control like itemizeM etc. behaves like regular frame otherwise.
